sent.orig: The consumer EFT includes the traditional transferring via ATM,POS and themodern EFT method via Internet.
sent.trans: 消费性电子资金划拨包括传统的利用ATM、POS等进行的划拨，也包括新兴的利用INTERNET为平台的网上划拨。

sent.orig: This can be performed via Shift+double-click as well, via the keyboard.
sent.trans: 可以在键盘上按住Shift键同时双击鼠标来完成此操作。

sent.orig: Accounts funded via credit card may restricted to receiving withdrawals via credit card.
sent.trans: 以信用卡注资的账户或许只限于通过信用卡提款。

sent.orig: The background-images for the content block are defined via CSS and are applied via IDs.
sent.trans: 做为内容块的背景图像是通过CSS和ID来定义的。

sent.orig: Water was delivered via a strap out of porous plastic and dispersed via a wick.
sent.trans: 水被交付了通过皮带在多孔塑料外面和被分散了通过灯芯。
